channel.title: Moparscape help
channel.description:
ok so i have downloaded Moparscape client.
I just wanted to know if someone or anyone could teach me the basics well in a private server.
not like be in the server but like how to make scripts and stuff. i know how to open up the item, npc, and object lists.
i know how to get the items. I know how to get multiple items in one thing.
but i made one character. Now i made a new character but all the lvls were 99. how would i fix that.
also some of the servers i was on before start you off at lvl 3. im fine with that, but when u hit something with
attack strength or deffence u got like 300 or 500 xp per hit. how do i do that?
Also it sometimes freezes on me. how do i stop that from happening.
how do i add a teleport? one server i was on had a ::help command. it brought up a thing with helpful stuff.
it said say ::lessers to go to the lesser demons.
or ::dragons to go to dragons. at the top of this it said like easy ways to make money and a whole load of stuff.
how do i do things like this? i know its a lot of questions but if you know an answer to any of them please tell me.
it would really help.
Thanks :) ~Now3r3~

item.title: Moparscape help
item.dc:creator: @wills1234 wills1234
item.description:
@wills1234 wrote:

um for the 99 lvl thing you need to go into character on your server file and change the stats in there to what you would like

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape help

item.description:

ok so i have downloaded Moparscape client.

I just wanted to know if someone or anyone could teach me the basics well in a private server.
